channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m absolutely terrible at managing money’: I’m 35 with zero savings and $8,000 debt. How do I turn my life around?
item.description: “I want to get into a financial position where I’ve got decent retirement savings.”

item.title: I’m 63 and planning to retire. I watched in horror as the markets tanked. Will I have enough to get me to my 90s?
item.description: “Both my parents lived to 98.”

item.title: Discount retailer Ollie’s adds Big Lots stores, and a jewelry seller retreats from malls
item.description: Retailers have responded to a long period of inflation with a renewed emphasis on value over less essential products.

item.title: Should 401(k) investors follow the advice of top fund managers?
item.description: It’s not a simple “buy” signal.

item.title: Adobe previews AI generated PowerPoints from raw customer data with ‘Project Slide Wow’
item.description: The fate of Project Slide Wow depends on user interest and engagement, as Adobe monitors social media conversations.

item.title: Beyond RAG: SEARCH-R1 integrates search engines directly into reasoning models
item.description: SEARCH-R1 trains LLMs to gradually think and conduct online search as they generate answers for reasoning problems.
